sponsor_opportunities.title: Showcase your product
sponsor_opportunities.details: The bicycle design community and the cycling community are not just curious, they are serious engineering brains.If you are willing to showcase the product for cycling and wellness community, this would be the place!

sponsor_opportunities.title: Craft , Collaborate and Grow
sponsor_opportunities.details: BCDC is a perfect place to connect with students and learners for all levels about bicycle designs: from beginners to those who need an advanced course to seasoned Pros who are looking to switch to a new tool, adopt a new process or discuss the intricacies of bicycle design and the future of mobility.

sponsor_opportunities.title: Just Partner
sponsor_opportunities.details: Sponsor a workshop, or a track. Sponsor the networking dinners or cocktails. Support a challenge or exhibit at one of our many events. Be an education partner or our travel partner. Sponsor scholars or support our content, our videos. There are many meaningful, relevant ways to get your brand to connect to our community.
